thread.title: Fashion Designer Siki Im Has a Love of Vinyl
thread.title_full: Fashion Designer Siki Im Has a Love of Vinyl - WSJ

author: Ray A. Smith
title: Fashion Designer Siki Im Has a Love of Vinyl
text:
Though fashion designer Siki Im passionately loves music, he only recently joined Spotify, the streaming service. So far, he hasn’t used it much. That’s in part because he prefers listening to music on vinyl when at home.
The designer has a collection of roughly 500 vinyl records stashed in his one-bedroom apartment in the Carroll Gardens neighborhood of Brooklyn, N.Y. A great deal of them are first presses that he bought when they were first released. The 36-year-old says he has kept every record he’s bought since his...
